cause.description:
A Cause for the better treatment of Cats/Or any animal in this case. More awarness on the Feline food trade taking place in Our own Country (not just urban legend) And to Strive for tougher penalties against animal offenders.
1. Cats for food in Canada must end
2. Spay and Neuter Your cats
3. Violence towards animals deserve tougher penelties
cause.mission: Stop the slaughter of Cats for Food And Domestic Abuse
cause.name: Feline Abuse
